column7:
$ put
*breakIf(!p ANY capacity>max items, max, too much items)
transferTo(!p ANY capacity)
*add(!p ANY capacity>max items, 1)
*sub(!p ANY capacity>max items, 1)
column8:
$ throw
transferTo(!p ANY capacity)
%
transferTo(! tile)
*sub(! parent>max items, 1)
column9:
$ pick up
breakIf(!p ANY capacity>max items, max, too much)
transferTo(!p ANY capacity)
add(!p ANY capacity>max items, 1)
